description: This is a FastAPI application source file that defines REST API endpoints for a notes management system, including user authentication, note CRUD operations, and health checks.

methods.name: health_check()
methods.description: Health check endpoint returning a simple message indicating system health.

methods.name: signup(user: UserCreate, db=Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Endpoint to register a new user with a unique email.

methods.name: login(form_data: OAuth2PasswordRequestForm = Depends(), db=Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Authenticates user and returns JWT token using OAuth2 form data.

methods.name: read_current_user(current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Retrieves information about the currently authenticated user.

methods.name: create_user_note(note: NoteCreate, db=Depends(get_db), current_user: User=Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Creates a new note associated with the authenticated user.

methods.name: list_notes( db=Depends(get_db), current_user: User=Depends(get_current_user), skip: int = 0, limit: int = Query(100, le=100), search: Optional[str] = None )
methods.description: Lists notes of the current user with optional search, pagination skipped, limit, and search parameters.

methods.name: get_user_note(note_id: int, db=Depends(get_db), current_user: User=Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Retrieves a specific note by ID for the current user.

methods.name: update_user_note(note_id: int, note: NoteUpdate, db=Depends(get_db), current_user: User=Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Updates an existing note owned by the user.

methods.name: delete_user_note(note_id: int, db=Depends(get_db), current_user: User=Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Deletes a note owned by the user.

methods.name: docs_info()
methods.description: Provides information about the API documentation endpoint.

ctags.name: list_notes
ctags.signature: ( db=Depends(get_db), current_user: User=Depends(get_current_user), skip: int = 0, limit: int = Query(100, le=100), search: Optional[str] = None )

ctags.name: update_user_note
ctags.pattern: /^def update_user_note(note_id: int, note: NoteUpdate, db=Depends(get_db), current_user: User=Depe/
ctags.signature: (note_id: int, note: NoteUpdate, db=Depends(get_db), current_user: User=Depends(get_current_user))
